docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: About Studytomy
docs.text: At Studytomy, we believe that education has the power to transform lives. Our online platform connects students with qualified tutors and instructors from around the world, providing a personalized and convenient learning experience. Whether you're looking to excel in academics, learn a new language, or develop new skills, StudyToMy is here to support you on your educational journey.

docs.title: Our Mission
docs.text: Our mission is to empower students by providing them with access to high-quality education and learning opportunities. We strive to create a global learning community where students can connect with experienced tutors who are passionate about sharing their knowledge and expertise. At StudyToMy, we take responsibility for your child/Children's progress in education. We will provide short notes on specific sections that need more attention with topic-based questions practice as well.

docs.title: Comprehensive Approach
docs.text: StudyToMy offers a comprehensive approach that encompasses a wide array of subjects which are thoughtfully designed to equip each student with the knowledge, skills, and unwavering support they require to not only excel but truly thrive in their academic pursuits.

docs.title: Our Vision
docs.text: Our vision is to create a world where every student has the opportunity to reach their full potential through access to high-quality education. We believe that education is the key to unlocking a brighter future for individuals and communities around the globe. By providing students with the tools and resources they need to succeed, we aim to make a positive impact on the world and inspire a lifelong love of learning.
